string-array.name: categories_array
string-array.item: Geography
History
Pop-Culture

string-array.name: geography_array
string-array.item: What was the name of the ancient supercontinent?:Terrestala/!Pangea/Pangula/Gaia
How many continents are there?:8/10/!7/6
How many countries are there?:183/!195/192/190
How many countries are members of the united Nations?:!193/180/62/104
How many oceans of the world are there?:!7/11/8/9
Which country has the most pyramids in the world?:Egypt/!Sudan/Peru/Mexico
Which continent is in all 4 hemispheres?:NA/SA/Asia/!Africa
What is the only country that borders the UK?:Algeria/Russia/!Ireland/France
90% of the Earth\’s population lives in which hemisphere?:!Northern/Southern/Western/Eastern
How many time zones does Australia have?:!3/4/5/2
What is The Netherlands also called?:Hollert/Hollend/!Holland/Hobband
What is the official currency of India?:Berry/!Rupee/Yen/Euro
After Alaska, which U.S. state has the longest coastline?:Mississippi/Texas/California/!Florida
What is the least populated U.S. state?:Iowa/Michigan/!Wyoming/Idaho
In which U.S. state can the world\’s tallest trees be found?:!California/New York/Oregon/Washington

string-array.name: history_array
string-array.item: What year did the French-Indian War start?:!1754/1763/1712/1745
What year did WW1 start?:1918/1912/!1914/1910
What year did WW2 start?:1930/1942/1945/!1939
What year did the Cold War start?:1970/!1947/1973/1991
Who is the most famous king of Macedonia?:Napoleon/!Alexander the Great/Osiris/Philip
Which mythology has a god named Pluto?:Roman/Egyptian/!Greek/Mayan
who is the Greek god of war?:Pluto/Zeus/Hades/!Ares
How many wars did the Carthaginians fight with the Romans?:2/!3/5/1
Who was Apollo\'s twin sister?:Hestia/Athena/!Artemis/Demeter
who was Zeus\' Wife?:!Hera/Aphrodite/Athena/Artemis
Aphrodite was the goddess of what?:Anger and sex/Love and hate/!Love and beauty/Beauty and war
How was Athena born?:Hera\'s womb/!Zeus\' head/The ocean/Flowers
Icarus flew too close to the what?:!Sun/Moon/Sea/Sand
What did Prometheus steal from Zeus to give to the mortals?:Plague/!Fire/Tears/Hate
Apollo was the god of what?:The heavens/Warfare/Animals/!The sun

string-array.name: pop_culture_array
string-array.item: Which anime are part of the Big 3?:Demon Slayer,Bleach,Dragon Ball/!Naruto,One Piece,Bleach/Naruto,One Piece,Dragon Ball/One Piece,Bleach,Demon Slayer
Who is Stan Lee\'s favorite superhero?:Captain America/Wolverine/!Spider-Man/Hulk
Which anime has the best selling manga of all time?:Dragon Ball/!One Piece/Naruto/Demon Slayer
Who is the voice actor of Zuko in ATLA?:Zach Eisen/Jack Sena/Crawford Wilson/!Dante Basco
Which MCU movie is the highest grossing?:Avengers Infinity War/Spider-Man No Way Home/!Avengers Endgame/Black Panther
What is the highest-grossing film of all time?:Avengers Endgame/!Avatar/Titanic/Star Wars The Force Awakens
Which guru did Zaheer follow the teachings of in TLOK?:!Laghima/Pathik/Gyatso/Pasang
What was the 1st infinity stone Thanos collected in Infinity war?:Power/!Space/Reality/Time
What was the 1st pokemon created?:!Rhydon/Bulbasaur/Victini/Pikachu
Which manga came 1st?:!Dragon Ball/Naruto/One Piece/Bleach
Who plays Thor in the MCU?:Chris Pratt/!Chris Hemsworth/Chris Evans/Chris Pine
What year did American Dragon Jake Long come out?:2004/2002/!2005/2008
What yar did Adventure Time come out?:!2010/2009/2008/2011
What year did Regular Show come out?:2011/2008/2009/!2010
Who holds the record for winning the most Oscars?:!Walt Disney/Will Smith/Daniel Day-Lewis/Anthony Hopkins
